original_title: Tom Who? The Enigma of Tom Kreisler
overview: Shirley Horrocksâ€™ doco sheds new light on the life and art of Tom Kreisler, a 20th-century New Zealand painter with scant interest in landscape but a strong affinity with Mexican traditions and the wit and verve of Pop Art.
title: Tom Who? The Enigma of Tom Kreisler
